Texts.Chs: 把^orange;观察者^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Watcher^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 尝试在你的^orange;能源建造机^reset;制作一个^orange;观察者^reset;，并把它带给我。
Texts.Eng: Powered stations are a ^orange;huge productivity booster^white;. With a ^orange;Watcher^reset; they are even more versatile! Try crafting a ^orange;watcher^reset; in your ^green;Power Station^reset; and bring it to me.

Texts.Chs: 观察者对于设备来说是非常重要的。他们会在你处于该星球上时保证用电设备的良好运行。如果你离开了该星球，那么^orange;所有的观察者将会复位^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Watchers are special, they'll keep powered devices in range running while your away planetside. Leaving a planet will ^orange;reset all of your watchers^reset;.
